title: Spacious Living! Dog Park! Pet Wash!
posting_body: Call Now -
show contact info
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1089 Sq.
Ft.
Welcome to a mountain view community that’s quiet, comfortable and near everything that matters.
Elevate, Centennial’s newest place to call home, brings you high-end apartment living close to the Denver Tech Center.
Your plush apartment offers large windows, a gourmet kitchen, high ceilings, walk-in closets and a private patio.
When it’s time for a little company, head to the sundeck for a swim, workout in the fitness center, catch a game in the lounge, grill on the patio and people watch.
Unwind, meet-up and be yourself in a community that takes easy living to a new level.
Elevate is now open!
Contact us today to hand-select your new Centennial apartment.
Features:

Stylish vinyl plank floors, Energy-efficient windows, Contemporary flat-panel cabinets, One-, two- and three-bedroom apartments, GE stainless steel appliances, Apartment Amenities, Brushed nickel fixtures, Quartz countertops, Private patios, some with mountain views, High ceilings, Full-size washers and dryers, Gourmet kitchens with subway tile backsplashes, Oversized walk-in closets
Community Amenities:

Entertainment kitchen, community dining room, Resort-style pool and infinity-edge spa, Sundeck with in-pool chaise lounges, Bark park and dog wash, Gaming room with big screen TV's, fireplace and billiards., 24/7 on-demand parcel lockers, Outdoor courtyards with fire pits and BBQ grills, Fully equipped conference room, Second-story lounge with big screen TVs and TopBrewer espresso machine, 24-hour fitness center, Bicycle repair station, Yoga and spinning studio with Peloton Bikes, Near Denver Tech Center with easy access to commuter corridors
Pet Policy
Residents are welcome to have spayed or neutered cats and dogs — up to two pets maximum.
Pet owners will be charged an additional deposit of $200, a one-time fee of $200 and a rental surcharge of $30 per month.
Please contact us for a list of our restricted breeds.
Income Requirements:
3 times the monthly rent
